map.legendDescription: Employment in industry (% of total employment)

title: Industry employment (% of total employment)
subtitle: Employment in industry/manufacturing is defined based on the International Standard Industrial Classification of All Economic Activities (ISIC). Employment refers to all persons of working age who, during a specified brief period, were in paid employment (whether at work or with a job but not at work) or in self-employment (whether at work or with an enterprise but not at work).
